Config.name: PMTMapSetup
Config.Param: default The PMT mapping file to read in. If default is passed the files in $CCMPROJECT/calibrationFiles/2019/mapping_master* will be used Must be the first param in this config

Config.name: CCMBuildAccumWaveform
Config.Param: BEAM Only look at triggers with name passed. Options are: - BEAM - STROBE - LED - ALL and any combination of the three, like BEAM STROBE
CCMAccumWaveformTriangle The build methods to use. Options are: CCMAccumWaveformTriangle CCMAccumWaveformTrianglePulseCut CCMAccumWaveformStart CCMAccumWaveformStartPulseCut
-9920 The earliest in the DAQ window to allow the pulse to start in ns Only needed if BuildMethod contains at least one PulseCut
-250 The latest in the DAQ window to allow the pulse to start in ns Only needed if BuildMethod contains at least one PulseCut

Config.name: CCMFindEvents
Config.Param: 0.2 The PE threshold for a 2ns bin to trigger event building
1 Flag to reset the Events class. Should only be used in the first instance of CCMFindEvents
CCMAccumWaveformTriangle Which CCMAccumWaveformMethod to use in finding the events
CCMDynamicLengthEvent Which CCMEvnetFinderID to use in finding the events options: CCMDynamicLengthEvent CCMFixedLengthEvent
0 Number of bins for the required length of the event only needed if EventFinderID == CCMFixedLengthEvent
